Manager

Interface IConquestUI

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConquestUI

    public interface IConquestUI

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void attackPlayer(Player[] playerList, java.util.ArrayList<Country> countryList)
      This method manage the attack of players
      void conquestUIAttackQuestion()
      This method just ask from player if player want to attack Y => to agree that want to attack N => to skip the attack
      void conquestUIFinish()
      This method shows that the attack is finished and call the move method
      void conquestUIGetCountryIdForAttack(java.util.List<Country> playerCountries)
      This method give the country Id from player and check the validity of it.
      void conquestUIGetNodes()
      This method give the path of note file to to load them in the map, then read the graphs and information about map and countries.
      void conquestUIMove()
      This method just ask from player if player want to move Y => to agree that want to move N => to skip the move
      void conquestUIShowStartMenu()
      This method is printing the start menu of the game
      int getNumberOfPlayer()
      numberOfPlayer method will ask the player to enter an integer for number of players and save the number for the next part to ask the player for their names.
      LeftArmiesResponse numberOfArmiesToleave(Country country)
      This method check the count of armies which player want to leave in moving
      void reinforcementOfPlayer(int armiesNumber, Player player)
      This method give N number of armies to the players and they are able to add them to their armies who are in each country.
      void showMap()
      Show the whole map in console.

    • Method Detail

      • conquestUIShowStartMenu

        void conquestUIShowStartMenu()

        This method is printing the start menu of the game

        The content of the menu is in the private field

        Private field name is StartGameMenuMessage.

      • conquestUIGetNodes

        void conquestUIGetNodes()

        This method give the path of note file to to load them in the map, then read the graphs and information about map and countries.

        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • conquestUIAttackQuestion

        void conquestUIAttackQuestion()
        This method just ask from player if player want to attack Y => to agree that want to attack N => to skip the attack

      • conquestUIMove

        void conquestUIMove()
        This method just ask from player if player want to move Y => to agree that want to move N => to skip the move

      • conquestUIFinish

        void conquestUIFinish()
        This method shows that the attack is finished and call the move method

      • conquestUIGetCountryIdForAttack

        void conquestUIGetCountryIdForAttack(java.util.List<Country> playerCountries)
        This method give the country Id from player and check the validity of it. Then call the attack method.
        Parameters:
        playerCountries - this is a list of countries

      • showMap

        void showMap()
        Show the whole map in console. Content map converted to a table which can be shown in the console

      • getNumberOfPlayer

        int getNumberOfPlayer()
        numberOfPlayer method will ask the player to enter an integer for number of players and save the number for the next part to ask the player for their names. if the player enter a number more than 5 or less than 2 he will get an error for entering a wrong number.
        Returns:
        num is number of players that player entered.

      • numberOfArmiesToleave

        LeftArmiesResponse numberOfArmiesToleave(Country country)
        This method check the count of armies which player want to leave in moving
        Parameters:
        country -
        Returns:
        an object which contains CountryId and Number of left armies in that country

      • attackPlayer

        void attackPlayer(Player[] playerList,
                  java.util.ArrayList<Country> countryList)
        This method manage the attack of players
        Parameters:
        playerList - list of players to play one by one
        countryList - list of countries to retrieve player's countries and adjacencies

      • reinforcementOfPlayer

        void reinforcementOfPlayer(int armiesNumber,
                           Player player)
        This method give N number of armies to the players and they are able to add them to their armies who are in each country.
        Parameters:
        armiesNumber - number of armies
